jobDescription: EXPECT MORE FROM YOUR CAREEREXPECT PPD PPD is a leading global contract research organization. At PPD we are passionate, deliberate, and driven by our purpose - to improve health.  PPD Laboratories offers the most comprehensive set of laboratory services available in the industry and continues to deliver innovative solutions to our clients through our collaborative approach, including PPD® Laboratories FSP. PPD® Laboratories FSP is a unique partnership that allows our clients to leverage the experience of our PPD staff, while allowing you, the employee, to gain direct experience working onsite at a pharmaceutical/ biopharmaceutical company, all while maintaining full-time benefits/advantages of being a part of PPD.  This position is on a client site that supports the process development of monoclonal antibody therapeutics and develops/validates the methods used for in-process/release/stress testing. As part of this overall goal, you would be required to perform routine and non-routine testing and assist in the pre-validation and validation experiments and creation and execution of experimental plan to support the method validation in a GMP environment. In addition, generating, documenting, and analyzing data for discussions and reports (e.g., method validation reports, technical reports) would be required.
